title: Plaid to Pay JPMorgan for Customer Data Amid Industry Feud
description: Plaid Inc. agreed to pay JPMorgan Chase & Co. for its consumer data, the latest accord in a battle between financial technology firms and banks over who can access the sought-after information.

title: Amazon Expects Kuiper Satellites to Serve Five Countries by 2026
description: Amazon.com Inc.â€™s satellite internet venture aims to be able to offer service to the US, Canada, France, Germany and the UK by the end of the first quarter of 2026, an executive said.

title: The Human Cost of Disrupting America's Fertility Industry
description: An investigation into clinical mistakes, staffing crises, and financial pressures at one of America's fastest-growing IVF chains.
